pages.text: The big brother of $(l:aoa3:swords#swords)swords$(/l), $(thing)Greatblades$() are a similar but slightly different weapon type.$(br)Attacking using a greatblade works the same as a sword, but $(thing)greatblades$() take longer to swing, hit harder, and reach further.
pages.title: Greatblades

pages.text: The best way to utilise a greatblade is to take advantage of its longer range, swiping at enemies from as far as you can reach to keep them at bay.$(br)While you still have to be fairly close to an enemy to use a greatblade, the extra distance is much more valuable than it may seem at first.$(br2)These weapons are most useful for tougher individual enemies that you don't want to come close to.
$(thing)Greatblades$() are $(l:aoa3:swords#swords)swords$(/l) bigger brother, and will act like one!
pages.title: A Greatblade

pages.text: Find info on all of the $(thing)greatblades$() in $(aoa) on the $(thing)official wiki$().
